content:
IBM and UCL (University College London) have collaborated on various technology projects over the years. The IBM-UCL partnership has produced several cutting-edge technology projects and research initiatives, which have the potential to drive innovation and impact in various fields.
*"Collaborating with UCL has allowed us to tap into a diverse pool of talent and expertise, enabling us to push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of technology."*  - Professor John McNamara (IBM,UCL)
*"Being part of a collaborative project with IBM has allowed me to work on cutting-edge technologies and gain real-world experience"* - John Smith, MSc student at UCL
If you would like to see the work we've done, simply click 'Projects' on the header. If you would like to get involved in any project or have ideas of your own, please fill in the form on the right.
